concept.title: Working with Identities
concept.shortdesc: Details the tasks you can do with the EIAM.

conbody.p: This section provides details about the tasks you perform using EIAM. The tasks you can perform are divided up into tasks for users, tasks for groups, and tasks for policies.
conbody.draft-comment: Let's create some typical workflows as process tables that link to the individual tasks. What a user would typically do. What an admin would typically do. Process for creating everything from scratch for a pristine environment.
